messages.title: Message from your candidate Robert Oxland
messages.content: Our politics is a mess. Scotland deserves better. It is time to stop talking about divisions.

messages.title: Message from the Leader
messages.content: Lib Dems will stand firm against Brexit. We pledge to stop Brexit and build a brighter future for our country.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Lib Dems will stand firm against Brexit.
Increase investment and front line staff in NHS Scotland.
Ensuring Scottish Universities can continue to attract EU research funding and staff.
Strive for Scotland to uphold environmental commitments.
Maintaining security cooperation with our European partners.
